scripts.wdev: wrangler pages dev -b WEATHER_API_KEY=$(grep -E '^WEATHER_API_KEY=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2- | sed 's/^"\(.*\)"$/\1/') -b API_URL=$(grep -E '^API_URL=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2- | sed 's/^"\(.*\)"$/\1/') -b API_USERNAME=$(grep -E '^API_USERNAME=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2- | sed 's/^"\(.*\)"$/\1/') -b API_PASSWORD=$(grep -E '^API_PASSWORD=' .env | cut -d '=' -f 2- | sed 's/^"\(.*\)"$/\1/') -- npm run dev
